Title.Text: Project Profit & Loss by Profit Center, Project Type, Employee

CustomProperties.description: Group is Closed or Open as marked in Job Manager.
Filters dashboard to only Profit Center Selected
Format: Actual number Budget number % Variance

Gross Profit Margin Colors: Dark Green: > 50% Light Green: 40% - 50% Light Red: 20% - 30% Dark Red: < 20%
Hours Efficiency = Budget Hours/Actual Hours

Gross Profit Margin Colors: Dark Green: > 50% Light Green: 40% - 50% Light Red: 20% - 30% Dark Red: < 20%
Hours Efficiency = Budget Hours/Actual Hours
